author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the yoghurt, lime juice, salmon and freshly ground black pepper in a food processor and blend until smooth. Transfer to a serving bowl. Serve the rye bread alongside with the lemon wedges. Garnish with dill to serve.
ingredients: 150g/5oz Greek yoghurt,  squeeze of lime juice,  110g/4oz smoked salmon, chopped,  freshly ground black pepper,  rye bread ,  lemon wedge ,  fresh dill
